Be a Part of Our Event

Join the vibrant community of Reimagine Food Fest and showcase your culinary talents and cultural crafts to a wide audience in New York City. Whether youâ€™re a seasoned chef, a local artisan, or a small business owner, we invite you to be part of this exciting culinary celebration.

Apply Now

Frequently Asked Questions

{{#> section/accordion id="why-join-us" title="Why Join Us?" }}

Reimagine Food Fest is not just a festival; it's an opportunity to grow your business and connect with other like-minded individuals in the industry. By joining us, you'll benefit from:

  • Extensive exposure to a diverse and engaged audience
  • A platform to showcase your products and culinary skills
  • Networking opportunities with other vendors and businesses
  • Increased visibility and promotion through our marketing channels
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="vendor-requirements" title="Vendor Requirements" }}

We welcome a variety of vendors who offer quality Asian-inspired foods, beverages, and culturally relevant goods. To maintain the highest standards for our festival, all applicants must meet the following criteria:

  • Must offer products or services aligned with Asian cultures
  • Compliance with all local health and safety regulations
  • Commitment to professionalism and customer service
  • Ability to handle logistics and operations for large-scale events
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="vendor-benefits" title="Vendor Benefits" }}

Reimagine Food Fest offers a unique opportunity for vendors to showcase their products and services to a diverse audience. By participating in our festival, you'll enjoy a range of benefits, including:

  • Access to a large and engaged audience of food enthusiasts
  • Opportunities to network with other vendors and industry professionals
  • Increased visibility and promotion through our marketing channels
  • A platform to showcase your products and culinary skills
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="how-to-apply" title="How to Apply" }}

To apply to be a vendor at Reimagine Food Fest, please follow the steps below:

  1. Complete the online application form with your business details and what you intend to offer at the festival.
  2. Submit any necessary supporting documents, such as menus, product lists, and certifications.
  3. Wait for our team to review your application. We will contact you to discuss further details and next steps.

If you have any questions about the application process or need more information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Apply Now {{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="setup-breakdown" title="Setup and Breakdown Procedures" }}

Understanding the logistics of participating in our festival is crucial. Here's what you need to know about setting up and closing down your booth:

  • Setup times and dates will be provided ahead of the event. Vendors are expected to be fully set up at least one hour before the festival opens to the public.
  • Breakdown may not begin until the official end of the festival and must be completed within the designated timeframe.
  • Each vendor is responsible for their own booth setup and teardown, including any required equipment and materials.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="payment-fees" title="Payment and Fees" }}

Participation in Reimagine Food Fest involves certain fees and payment guidelines:

  • A non-refundable application fee is required upon submission of your vendor application.
  • Booth fees vary depending on size and location within the festival grounds. Details will be provided upon acceptance.
  • All payments must be completed prior to the event to secure your spot.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="what-to-bring" title="What to Bring" }}

Being well-prepared is key to a successful festival experience. Here are essential items you should bring:

  • All necessary equipment for your booth, including tables, chairs, and tents if not provided by the festival organizers.
  • Sufficient supplies to cover the entirety of the festival to avoid running out of products.
  • Any necessary permits and documentation required for selling food or goods.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="weather-policies" title="Weather Policies" }}

Our festival is held rain or shine. Here's how we handle different weather conditions:

  • Vendors are advised to prepare for all weather conditions, including potential rain or high temperatures.
  • In case of severe weather, updates and safety guidelines will be communicated through official channels.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="vendor-selection" title="Vendor Selection Process" }}

Our vendor selection process is designed to ensure a diverse and high-quality lineup of participants. Here's how we evaluate vendor applications:

  • Applications are reviewed based on the quality, uniqueness, and cultural relevance of the products or services offered.
  • We aim to curate a balanced mix of vendors to provide attendees with a wide range of options and experiences.
  • Preference may be given to vendors who align with the mission and values of Reimagine Food Fest.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion id="vendor-communication" title="Vendor Communication" }}

Clear and timely communication is essential for a successful festival experience. Here's how we keep vendors informed:

  • Regular updates and important information will be shared with vendors via email and official communication channels.
  • Vendors are encouraged to reach out to our team with any questions, concerns, or special requests.
  • Our team is committed to providing support and guidance to vendors throughout the application and participation process.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion title="Booth Specifications" }}

Understanding the booth specifications is crucial for planning your setup. Here are the key details:

  • Booth sizes and configurations will be provided upon acceptance of your application.
  • All booths will have access to electricity, but additional equipment such as tables and chairs may need to be arranged separately.
  • If you have specific requirements for your booth setup, please inform us during the application process, and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion title="Food Handling and Safety Regulations" }}

Ensuring compliance with food handling and safety regulations is essential for all vendors. Here's what you need to know:

  • All food vendors must adhere to local health and safety regulations, including obtaining necessary permits and certifications.
  • Proper food handling practices, including hygiene and sanitation, must be followed at all times.
  • Our team will provide guidelines and support to help vendors navigate food safety requirements.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion title="Marketing and Promotion" }}

Maximizing your visibility at the festival is essential for attracting customers. Here's how we support vendor marketing and promotion:

  • All vendors will be featured on our website and included in promotional materials leading up to the event.
  • We encourage vendors to promote their participation through their own channels and social media platforms.
  • Opportunities for collaborative marketing efforts and cross-promotion with other vendors may be available.
{{/section/accordion}} {{#> section/accordion title="Accessibility Accommodations" }}

Ensuring accessibility for all attendees is a priority for our festival. Here's how we accommodate accessibility needs:

  • We strive to make our event accessible to individuals with disabilities, including providing wheelchair-accessible pathways and facilities.
  • If you require specific accommodations for your booth or have accessibility concerns, please let us know, and we will work with you to accommodate your needs.
{{/section/accordion}}

Apply Now

Become a key part of Reimagine Food Fest by joining us as a vendor. This is your chance to present your unique culinary creations, cultural goods, and innovative products to a broad audience, celebrating the rich diversity of Asian culture in the heart of New York City.

Apply Now
